mapper.insert: insert into base_class (id, class_code, name, is_deleted, enable_state, create_time, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{classCode,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isDeleted,jdbcType=BIT}, #{enableState,jdbcType=BIT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update base_class set class_code = #{classCode,jdbcType=BIGINT}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=BIT}, enable_state = #{enableState,jdbcType=BIT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, class_code, name, is_deleted, enable_state, create_time, update_time from base_class
